Next: XFConfig.<WidgetClass> Up: Supporting new widgets Previous: XFAdd.<WidgetClass>

XFAddTmp.<WidgetClass>

The optional procedure `` XFAddTmp.<WidgetClass>'' is used to create a temporary widget of that class. This can be useful when the widget creation command is not the same as the widget class name (take a look at the definition file for the hypertext widget).
